column4: whats the diference between apt-get update and apt-get upgrade
in windows my display refresh rate is 85
in ubuntu i can select only 75
In your xorg.conf file, you need to set horiz/vert rates to match your monitor
using the command 'sudo ddcprobe | grep monitorrange', you'll get two ranges. The first one goes in your monitor section under HorizSync, the second goes in VertRefresh
after you change those values to match, restart your X server by using ctrl-alt-backspace.
